str2: Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To be aged, act as an ambassador. From the base of presbuteros; to be a senior, i.e. act as a representative.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A (light) chain, bond. Of uncertain derivation; a fetter or manacle.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: To speak freely, boldly; To be confident.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
